about_the_game:
This is a story based DLC, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

To get closer to Sapphire, Kotori decides to join a Foreign Languages Club with her.
But previously she was not at all interested in foreign languages and now she has to redouble her efforts to study it.

Help Kotori in learning English, and also find out the main secret of Sapphire.

In this DLC, you'll find:

  • New route with Sapphire
  • Joining a Foreign Languages Club
  • You can play separately to the main storyline

Warning: This route has no yuri content!
detailed_description:
This is a story based DLC, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

To get closer to Sapphire, Kotori decides to join a Foreign Languages Club with her.
But previously she was not at all interested in foreign languages and now she has to redouble her efforts to study it.

Help Kotori in learning English, and also find out the main secret of Sapphire.

In this DLC, you'll find:

  • New route with Sapphire
  • Joining a Foreign Languages Club
  • You can play separately to the main storyline

Warning: This route has no yuri content!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: BlackberryNOVA – Foreign Languages Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: To get closer to Sapphire, Kotori decides to join a Foreign Languages Club with her.
